author: Cynthia Benson
text: Did a great job on the various repairs at our house. Ricky and all crew responsive to our needs and all of our...
owner_reply: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure working for you.

author: Sampson0814
text: This place is top notch! If you’re looking for someone who takes pride in their work you’ve found the right place!
owner_reply: Much appreciated! We look forward to continuing working with you.

author: John White
text: I have heard nothing but good things from them serving our Timberwood community
owner_reply: John, thank you so much for the kind review. Also, we have heard only great things about you and White Fox.!!

author: Debbie Stevens
text: Wow all I can say is wow ricky cj and crew fixed my outside to stop water from coming in the damage to my floors are...
owner_reply: Debbie, it has truly been a pleasure working for you. We look forward to continue this great relationship. Thank you for the kind review.

author: scottie wise
text: The best experience I've had in a long time with home repair very professional very good
owner_reply: Thank you for your kinds words, Scott. It was a pleasure working for you. Please give us a call if there is anything else you need.

author: Keith F
owner_reply: Thank you Keith for the positive review! We look forward to working with you again soon.

author: Ryan Lindahl
text: Excellent crew! Awesome work done in my kitchen. Time efficient and very trustworthy! Will use them again and recommend these guys to anyone!
owner_reply: Ryan, thank you for the great review. You were a great client to work with! Very reasonable and responsive. We hope to work with you again.

author: Rikki
text: I would definitely recommend hiring Ricky and his team for repairs! They are friendly and responsive and provide a...
owner_reply: Thanks Rikki for the kind review! We look forward to working again with you.

author: Reuben Jacob
text: These guys are extremely experienced and were very helpful! They did so much work very quickly and I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for any kind of repairs to their home. They do it all!
owner_reply: Reuben! Thank you for your kind words. We look forward to working with you again soon.

author: Kala Guido
text: Nothin’ to it crew does great work with an awesome attitude.
owner_reply: Thats very kind of you, Kala. Looking forward to working with you again soon!

author: Joseph Ray
text: Always ready to help. Definitely did it better than I could. Who needs Youtube when you have these guys?
owner_reply: Thanks, Joe! Your review means a lot to us. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

author: Karen Hickman
text: A great Christian based company... Very particular in doing their job well.
owner_reply: Thank you, Karen. We look forward to continuing to work with you.

author: Wyatt Winburn
text: Does great work, cleans job site well, and is very polite!
owner_reply: Glad everything was done to your expectations. Thanks for the review.
